
### 1-level exercise (1)  {.smaller}

::: {style="font-size: 70%"}

6-bit virtual addresses, 6-bit physical; 8 byte pages, 1 byte PTE<br/>
page tables 1 page; PTE: 3 bit PPN (MSB), 1 valid bit, 4 other;<br/>
page table base register <code>0x20</code>; translate virtual address <code>0x31</code>

:::
